config.ohmysplashtext.option.button.desc: Enable or Disable the Config Screen Button in the Title Screen
config.ohmysplashtext.option.gragh.desc: Preview the current function graph (Experimental Content)
config.ohmysplashtext.option.rotationFun:
Customize the Rotation Animation
n Represents Current Timestamp(Seconds)
+, -, *, /, sin(), cos(), abs(), %, pi Supported
Example: sin(n/1000*2*pi)*1.5 = 1.5sin(2π(n/1000))
Requires "Rotation Animation" Enable
config.ohmysplashtext.option.rotationSpe:
Set the Text Rotation Speed(Degrees Per Second)
Requires "Rotation Animation" Enable
config.ohmysplashtext.option.splashingFu:
Customize Splashing Animation
n Represents Current Timestamp(Seconds)
+, -, *, /, sin(), cos(), abs(), %, pi Supported
Example: 0.5+abs(cos(n%(2000/3)/1000*pi*3))*2 = 0.5+2|cos(3π(n%(2000/3)/1000))|
Requires "Splashing Animation" Enable
config.ohmysplashtext.option.splashingSp:
Set the Text Splashing Speed
Requires "Splashing Animation" Enable
config.ohmysplashtext.title: Config Screen
graghScreen.ratio: Ratio X: %s Per Pixels  Ratio Y: %s Per Pixels
graghScreen.title: Function Preview Screen
